page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: There are three schools in the area; an infant middle & comprehensive; The Augustus Smith, is a purpose built day school, with approx.200 pupils between the ages of nine & thirteen.Ashlyns school, formerly part of the Ashlyns estate, was originally built as an orphanage, and is now a comprehensive day school for 750 boys & girls between the ages of thirteen to eighteen. There are 47 fulltime and 9 partime teachers. The school has a sixth form, and this enables some pupils to obtain the qualifications necessary for university.Haresfoot school opened in 1985, & is a private day school for children aged three to four and a half.The Montessori Method (of teaching the very young,both normal & defective) by natural activi- ies rather than strict control.The sc- hool has a nursery,with a total of 58.
